message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $20,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can you meet me at that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest.  While I understand your perspective on the price, I can't go as low as $12,000.  How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?
I'm still interested in the product, but $17,000 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $14,000?
